price: 22. (diciéndose:) «Vayamos a la huerta si queremos recoger sus frutos (sin que nadie nos vea)».
arabic: أَنِ ٱغۡدُواْ عَلَىٰ حَرۡثِكُمۡ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰرِمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ani igh'dū ʿalā ḥarthikum in kuntum ṣārimīna
